abstract: Juan Martin del Potro beats John-Patrick Smith, advancing to quarterfinals of Delray Beach Open; other tennis news noted.

headline.main: Juan Martín del Potro Into Quarterfinals

snippet: Juan Martín del Potro, the 2009 United States Open champion and former world No. 4, beat the qualifier John-Patrick Smith, 6-4, 6-4, to advance to the quarterfinals of the Delray Beach Open in Florida.
lead_paragraph: Juan Martín del Potro, the 2009 United States Open champion and former world No. 4, beat the qualifier John-Patrick Smith, 6-4, 6-4, to advance to the quarterfinals of the Delray Beach Open in Florida.
